Package edu.macalester.graphics

Class GraphicsText

java.lang.Object
edu.macalester.graphics.GraphicsObject
edu.macalester.graphics.GraphicsText
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fillable
public class GraphicsText
extends GraphicsObject
implements Fillable
A string of text that can be drawn to the screen

  • Constructor Summary

    • getFillColor

      public java.awt.Paint getFillColor()
      Description copied from interface: Fillable

    • testHit

      public boolean testHit​(double x, double y)
      Description copied from class: GraphicsObject
      Tests whether the given point is on the boundary or interior of this graphic object's shape. The point is in this object's local coordinates, not canvas coordinates.

      Does not account for appearance, including stroke width and transparency.

      Specified by:
      testHit in class GraphicsObject

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects​(GraphicsText other)
      Returns true if this text visually overlaps the given other text. This method assumes both are in the some coordinate system; it does not account for them belonging to different GraphicsGroups.

    • getBounds

      public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBounds()
